event_description: User clicked download button on Ima product page - key conversion event
User clicked on a project card/link to view details
User clicked on a social profile link (LinkedIn, Instagram, Calendar)
User clicked to read a blog post
User clicked on the email link to contact
User clicked to book a calendar meeting
User copied the current page URL for sharing
User opened a project modal/dialog to see full details
User interacted with the Tally form to request case study access - lead generation event
